title: Potential new therapy for Crohn's, colitis identified

title_detail.value: Potential new therapy for Crohn's, colitis identified

summary: Researchers have found a compound that may treat inflammatory bowel disease without directly targeting inflammation. The compound tamps down the activity of a gene linked to blood clotting. They discovered that the gene was turned on at sites of intestinal inflammation and damage, and blocking its activity reduces IBD symptoms in mice.
